title: Inside the Parker - Substance Scandal Gets Stickier;  Yankees Announcer Michael Kay; WS Champ Kevin Millar
itunes:title: Inside the Parker - Substance Scandal Gets Stickier;  Yankees Announcer Michael Kay; WS Champ Kevin Millar
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob looks at MLB moving quickly to cut off the bleeding from the pitchers foreign substance scandal, Fernando Tatis, Jr. continuing to amazed, and Jacob De Grom's historic first half. Also, Pocket Protector Stat of the Week, Foul or Fair.

Guests: World Series Champ Kevin Millar discusses the foreign substance scandal consuming the headlines,. Yankees Announcer Michael Kay discusses his new book, and gives his take on the Bombers inconsistent first half.

Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts and follow Rob on Twitter!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
